Many clinical studies which have now been presented require a severity stratification based on clinical and /or biological parameters [ 18] such as:
-
respiratory frequency ≥30/min
-
PaO 2/FiO 2 <300 mm Hg in oxygen
-
blood oxygen saturation ≤93 %
-
tracheal intubation with mechanical ventilation
-
Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA) score
-
ICU length of stay
-
Hospital length of stay
